name: Mass O' Kyzt
description: Mass O' Kyzt is an arena based platformer wherein you upgrade your enemies. Play as an astronaut fighting a psychic alien race on their home planet!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 2.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: It's a 2D game without too many fancy effects, you're probably fine if you're using a computer built in the last 5 years.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
